summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York dated July 31, 2019. It lists staff assignments, posts, and shifts, including a specific entry for an officer named Noel, T assigned to the Special Housing Unit (SHU).

persons.name: Noel, T
persons.context: Listed as assigned to SHU #3 (Special Housing Unit) on the MCC daily assignment roster for July 31, 2019.

events.title: MCC Daily Staff Assignments
events.description: Standard daily assignment roster for correctional staff at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, detailing posts and shifts.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), New York, NY
keyFacts: Document is a daily staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The roster is dated Wednesday, July 31, 2019.
It details various posts, shifts (e.g., 07:00-15:00), and staff assignments including captains, lieutenants, and officers.
One named individual, Officer Noel, T, is listed as assigned to SHU #3 (Special Housing Unit).
The document appears to be a routine administrative record from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held.
